name: Monster Daycare
description:
Backstory

Franky just can't make a living as a professional monster anymore, and has fallen on hard times. So, he decided to take out a loan and follow his lifelong dream ....

Opening a daycare!

What could possibly go wrong?

Controls

Left Click - Move Franky

Right Click - Scare Kids

Try to get all the Kids into the green play pen before their parents arrive!
